greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Number of nonnegative integer matrices with total sum n, distinct columns with equal sums and any number of nonzero rows in nonincreasing lexicographic order.
comment: The condition that the rows be in nonincreasing order is equivalent to considering nonequivalent matrices up to permutation of rows.
results.author: _Andrew Howroyd_, Jan 11 2020
